name: Soham Penshanwar
tagline: AI systems, secure by design — building privacy-first fintech & tooling.

projects.title: ArchiveMind
projects.description: AI-powered legacy data extraction and processing tool designed for ministries and banks to modernize archival systems with intelligent document processing.

projects.title: PolicyVault Nexus
projects.description: RBI-compliant secure data gateway for fintech with zero-persistence architecture, advanced tokenization, and real-time policy enforcement.

projects.title: RE-DACT
projects.description: Chrome extension for automated sensitive data redaction in documents and images using advanced OCR and ML-based pattern recognition.

highlights: Managed budgets exceeding ₹5L+ for 12+ technical events and workshops
Led cybersecurity workshops and capture-the-flag competitions
Coordinated with industry partners for sponsorships and technical sessions
Published internal research on optimized key exchange protocols
Developed prototype implementations for secure messaging systems
Designed compliance frameworks for RBI regulations
Implemented zero-trust architecture for financial data processing
Security audits and threat modeling for payment gateways
